### Research Lab Setup at (8.5, 0.5)

### Power Generation System near (-9.5, 24.5)
Partially constructed power generation system consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at (-9.5, 23.0)
- Steam engine at (-9.5, 19.5)
Currently not operational due to missing connections

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Ensure required materials are in inventory before attempting insertion operations
- Check inventory for required items before attempting to place entities

### Entity Placement Errors
- When placing steam engines, ensure the terrain is suitable and there are no obstacles
- Check terrain conditions (like water tiles) before attempting to place structures

### Crafting System Errors
- Complex items requiring assembling machines (like copper plates for automation science packs) cannot be crafted by hand
- Ensure all prerequisite items and proper crafting facilities are available before attempting to craft complex items

### Connection Errors
- The power generation system requires proper connections between components (offshore pump -> boiler -> steam engine)
- Ensure entities are properly aligned and connected with appropriate pipes

### API Usage Errors
- When working with entity dimensions, use proper attribute access methods instead of direct arithmetic operations
- Ensure correct prototype references when accessing entity properties
